title: 5rp for a Jayce drawing?
body:
Hello fellow Summoner! My name is Jake (ign Sc00psssssss). I've been playing on the fields of justice shorter (about a year) than you have but I just thought it would be nice if you do me a solid, maybe. I recently purchased some RP to buy a Shaco Skin (Masked to be exact) and I still have some RP left over. I saw that Jayce, a champ that I've had my eye on for awhile, is on sale this week but I'm 5rp off. I new that acquiring this RP would be no easy task so I drew Jayce to the best of my ability :). But, you are still the determining factor, you have to decide if this drawing is worth this 5rp! Thank you for Reading my lengthy babble and I hope you respond soon!
Edit: Grammar 
Edit_2: They actually did it! :D Best support staff evar!

replies.body: Believe in the heart of the cards and power of friendship.

> Believe in the heart of the cards and power of friendship.

Why does this sound like something you would hear off of my little pony lol

Hey Sc00psssssss, that's an awesome drawing.  You really brought out his handsome debonair.  :P  You should send this to Player Support, they might be able to help you out!  

[Submit a Player Support Ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new)
Actually I did and I still have yet to get a response so I think this was just wishful thinking xD
